opponent.label: Fischl
opponent.artist: HorseKiller, NinjaMonkey4200 (Fischl Base), Remillia (Posing, Model Tweaks)
opponent.description: Fischl, otherwise known as her aliases such as 'Prinzessin der Verurteilung' and by her real name, 'Amy', is an investigator ruling from Mondstadt. A chuunibyou obsessed with fairy tales who travels with a night raven named Oz, who talks and translates her extremely complicated sentences for her.
